    • Wela'lieg

Resources

Migmaq.org

The Mi'gmaq Research Partnership blog. Read blog posts by Mi'gmaq learners, speakers, and researchers.

Migmaq Language Wiki

A collaborative source for information on Mi'gmaq grammar. Learn about Mi'gmaq from a linguistic perspective or contribute your own knowledge of grammar to the project.

Quizlet

A flashcard collection site. Make your own decks to study with or take advantage of Mi'gmaq decks that have already been created. Study in several ways, incorporate sound and video files into your cards, and share with others. Also available as a smartphone app.

Tumblr

The official Tumblr of the Mi'gmaq Research Partnership. Language learning inspiration and more.

Instagram

Listuguj Education Directorate's Instagram page. Promotes learning Mi'gmaq through videos and pictures.

Twitter

Listuguj Mi'gmaq language program's Twitter account. Bridges technology and tradition to keep the language alive and well in communities and on the web.

Facebook

A Facebook group for Mi'gmaq learners and speakers in Listuguj. Members meet to practice conversational Mi'gmaq in Listuguj.

©2015 Listuguj Education Directorate
